titleStmt.title: A prognostication made for y[e] yeere of our Lorde God 1566 declaryng the chau[n]ge, full, & quarters of the moone, w[ith] other,accustomable matters, seruing all England / by Maister F. Cox ...
titleStmt.author: Coxe, Francis, fl. 1560.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprynted [at London?] at the long shop adioining vnto S. Mildreds Churche in the Pultrie by John Alde,

notesStmt.note: Date of imprint suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
Imperfect: stained and torn, with some loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.

place.placeName: London?] at the long shop adioining vnto S. Mildreds Churche in the Pultrie
